name: Roman Salad With Pasta
recipeYield: 6 main course servings or 12 side-dish servings
keywords: appetizer, main course, side dish, pasta, tomato, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 5 large ripe tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch dice
2 teaspoons salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss together the tomatoes, onion, basil, 2 teaspoons salt and pepper. Let stand at least 2 hours.

Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil. Add the rigatoni and cook until al dente, about 10 minutes. Drain. Toss the warm pasta into the salad, season with additional salt and pepper to taste and serve.
